duties_responsibilities.duty: Maximize sales and effective planning for retail stores and partnering with national customers.
Support and complete incidental activities such as merchandising, shelving, and pricing.
Develop and maintain a complete knowledge of Mondelēz International, primarily Nabisco products, sales systems, and procedures.
Ensure leading brands are well represented, stocked, and maintained through the implementation of guidelines.
Perform in-store planning by tailoring programs and fact-based sales presentations to the customer's needs.
Develop strong business relationships with store management to provide service and value beyond the customer's expectations.
Work with customers to ensure sufficient product is ordered to support consumer take away, including from incremental racks and displays, for DSD.
Communicate plans and effectively manage merchandising resources to build sales volume at store level.
Monitor and report on competitive activity and document all pricing activities.
Be a collaborator between our Customer Business teams and customer’s store management.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required, college degree highly preferred.
